memberdef.name: size

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of elements along dimension dim.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the number of elements along dimension dim.
A
matrix for which you want to know the size.
dim
Dimension along which you want the number of elements. 1 = number of rows, 2 = number of columns
An integer value of the number of elements along the desired dimension.

briefdescription.para: Returns the size of matrix A.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the size of matrix A in a matrix_size_type variable. auto msize = size(A); int num_rows = msize.rows; int num_cols = msize.cols;
A
matrix for which you want to know the size.
A matrix_size_type variable containing the number of rows and cols.

briefdescription.para: Returns a matrix of size M x N containing all zeros.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns a matrix of size M x N containing all zeros.
M
Number of rows.
N
Number of columns.
An M x N matrix containing zeros for each element.

briefdescription.para: Returns a vector of length N containing all zeros.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns a vector of length N containing all zeros.
N
Number of elements.
A vector of length N containing zeros for each element.

briefdescription.para: Returns a matrix of size M x N containing all ones.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns a matrix of size M x N containing all ones.
M
Number of rows.
N
Number of columns.
An M x N matrix containing ones for each element.

briefdescription.para: Returns a vector of length N containing all ones.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns a vector of length N containing all ones.
N
Number of elements.
A vector of length N containing ones for each element.

memberdef.argsstring: (const matrix< T > A, int m, int n)
memberdef.name: repmat

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< T > v1, int m, int n)
memberdef.name: repmat

briefdescription.para: Performs array multiplication on matrices A and B.

detaileddescription.para: Each element of A is multiplied by each element of B. The matrix that is returned is the same size as A and B.

briefdescription.para: Performs array multiplication on vectors v1 and v2.

detaileddescription.para: Each element of v1 is multiplied by each element of v2. The vector that is returned is the same size as v1 and v2.

briefdescription.para: Performs right array division on matrices A and B.

detaileddescription.para: Each element of A is divided by each element of B. The matrix that is returned is the same size as A and B. Equivalent to A./B in MATLAB.

briefdescription.para: Performs right array division on vectors v1 and v2.

detaileddescription.para: Each element of v1 is divided by each element of v2. The vector that is returned is the same size as v1 and v2. Equivalent to v1./v2 in MATLAB.

briefdescription.para: Performs left array division on matrices B and A.

detaileddescription.para: Each element of A is divided by each element of B. The matrix that is returned is the same size as B and A. Equivalent to B. in MATLAB.

briefdescription.para: Performs left array division on vectors v2 and v1.

detaileddescription.para: Each element of v1 is divided by each element of v2. The vector that is returned is the same size as v2 and v1. Equivalent to v2. in MATLAB.

briefdescription.para: Returns the transpose of matrix A.
Returns the transpose of vector v1.
Returns the complex-conjugate transpose of matrix A.
Returns the complex-conjugate transpose of vector v1.
Computes the sum of each column of A.
Computes the sum of vector v1.
Converts matrix A to a column vector.
Converts a column vector to a 1 x length(v1) matrix.

memberdef.argsstring: (const T x1, const T x2, const int N)
memberdef.name: linspace

briefdescription.para: Produces a vector containing N values equally spaced between x1 and x2, inclusively.

detaileddescription.para:
Produces a vector containing N values equally spaced between x1 and x2, inclusively.
x1
The minimum value.
x2
The maximum value.
N
The number of values between x1 and x2.
A vector containing N equally spaced values between x1 and x2, inclusively.

memberdef.name: logspace

briefdescription.para: Produces a vector containing N values logarithmically spaced between 10^(x1) and 10^(x2), inclusively.

Produces a vector containing N values logarithmically spaced between 10^(x1) and 10^(x2), inclusively.
x1
The base 10 logarithm of the minimum value.
x2
The base 10 logarithm of the maximum value.
N
The number of values between 10^(x1) and 10^(x2).
A vector containing N logarithmically spaced values between 10^(x1) and 10^(x2), inclusively.

memberdef.name: eig

briefdescription.para: Generalized complex-valued eigenvalue solver using LAPACK function call.

detaileddescription.para: This function returns the eigenvalues(lambda) of the complex-valued generalized eigenvalue problem: Ax_r = lambda*Bx_r or x_l^T*A = lambda*x_l^T*B. The eigenvalues are returned by default. To return the right or left eigenvectors, supply the function with a complex<double> matrix object in the 3rd or 4th parameters, respectively.

The keycpp namespace prevents KeyCpp functions and classes from interfering with other C++ libraries, for instance the std library.
